name: SneakyCops
description:
This game is an ArtFx end of year project

SneakyCops is a game in which all your senses will be challenged, I wish I had said that but it's kinda wrong...

This game is a 2D infiltration game in which you play a member of the anti-terrorist special forces trained to infiltrate and neutralize terrorists without firing a single bullet.

In this game you will be confronted with several types of enemies and situations that will give you a hard time. If you don't kill any enemies, you will be rewarded while if you only kill one of them, you can say goodbye to the max score
